ComicInfo.Summary:
America’s longest-running satire magazine continues to skewer everything pop culture! MAD #31 features a wide variety of classic MAD movie and TV parodies.
Plus, vintage MAD pop culture parodies and favourites like “Spy vs. Spy”, “MAD Look at…” by Sergio Aragones, “The Lighter Side of…” by Dave Berg, and much more from the Usual Gang of Idiots. MAD will surely cure what ails you with a shot of humour in the jugular vein.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-18 22:30:13. [Issue ID 988981]
